title: Help for download of League on MacBook Air
body: Basically, I have a MacBook Air I'm using for high school right now, and a bunch of my friends play League. I first downloaded it from the normal launcher and it would crash at 80% of the game download in the client, I kept retrying and had the same issue (Error 004). I tried on the Oceania Mac installer but the same issue occurred. I have been trying to find solutions for about 3 days and I don't want to have to turn to the other game some of my friends play... D-DOTA 2... Regardless of jokes, and in all seriousness, I really need help with this. If you find a working solution I would really appreciate you helping me out with this, because I have always wanted to get into a MOBA but this issue is stopping me from getting in one of the only ones my friends play.

replies.body: Sorry for the trouble's you've been facing here.  :(  Most common cases of issues like this, especially on Macs, are caused by an unstable connection getting cut off from our patching service.  Start off with each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network and smooth things out.
Thank you so much for the help!
